name: Ramesh Gupta
content: Excellent service from GKP Auto! I bought a refurbished Hyundai Creta and the quality is outstanding. The team was very professional and helpful throughout the process.

name: Sunita Devi
content: Very satisfied with my purchase from GKP Auto. They provided complete transparency about the car condition and offered a fair price. Highly recommended for used car buyers in UP!

name: Anil Kumar Singh
content: GKP Auto has a great collection of refurbished cars. I purchased a Honda City and the after-sales service has been excellent. They truly care about customer satisfaction.

name: Pooja Mishra
content: The best car dealership in Gorakhpur! Professional staff, quality cars, and transparent dealings. I got my dream SUV at an affordable price. Thank you GKP Auto!
